author: Anonymous Scale
title: Local lifting
question:
When a question asks for how many definitions are lifted for a given function when it is called, are we assuming ALL functions defined within local are always lifted regardless of whether the function actually uses it? So for example:
(define (b n)
  (local [(define (one x) (* x 1))
          (define (two x) (* x b))
          (define (three x) (* x n n n))
          (define a n)
          (define b (* n n))
          (define c (* n n n))]
    (one (two (three n)))))
here when b is called, only 4 of the local definitions are actually used but regardless, 6 definitions are lifted?
